scenariodescription: The robot is transporting a box in the small warehouse. It moves through a passageway and takes a turn at a blind corner, immediately encountering an employee coming from the opposite direction. The warehouse has aisles formed by racks and open areas designated for packaging.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is walking towards the intersection from the opposite direction. When the robot becomes visible, Human 1 stops completely and waits until the robot is no longer blocking their path.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot stops when it detects the human very close. It says 'PROCEED' to the human and waits until the path ahead is clear. Once it detects that the human is no longer blocking its path, it resumes its task of transporting the box and continues navigating through the passageway.
